title: Amazon API Gateway with a Client Certificate
description: Create a REST API Gateway with a Client Certificate.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The SAM template deploys an Amazon API Gateway REST API endpoint that uses a Client Certificate that will be used to call your integration endpoints in the 'Prod' Stage.
